name: user-management-system
description: Full-stack user management system with Vue 3 SPA and Vercel serverless functions

scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run build:api
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:web
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage --workspace=api && npm run test:coverage --workspace=web
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:web && npm run test:e2e
scripts.format: npm run format --workspace=api && npm run format --workspace=web
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check --workspace=api && npm run format:check --workspace=web

author: Development Team
